segments.text: Hey Jack . Are you excited about starting work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I'm really looking forward to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was more exciting , starting college or starting work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're pretty similar , but in different ways . I really can't decide . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For me , I think starting school was more exciting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does that mean work isn't that great ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's different for everyone , but because I knew school was going to be so much fun , I really got excited about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But work is a huge portion of our lives . I'm looking forward to making it fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a great attitude to have . I don't think you'll have any problems in the workforce .
segments.speaker: S1
